dimension: 9/16 x 1 5/8 x 1 5/8 in. (1.4 x 4.1 x 4.1 cm) (overall, closed)
title: Manju [landscape, bridge and hut]
description: square in shape, with squared-off corners; top is decorated with an openwork metal flower around post hole; bottom on exterior decorated with landscape with bridge in front and cottage in distance; interior of lower section decorated with engraved flowers, geometric design at center and cloud shapes
